label: label
omniHelpIdea: The main idea is to save records via input using simple syntax, where '#' means tag name and '*' means the amount of entities. Than this records amount summarized by tag and can be visualized at statistics page.
omniHelpMandatory: Tag name and description is mandatory. Amount is optional and by default it is equal to 1.
omniHelpAmount: It is not allowed to input more than one entity amount.
omniHelpHotkey: Hot-key to switch between 'search' and 'add' mode is Alt + '/'.
